column4: hey guys how do I configure my laptop at home so that I can telnet it or make ftp when am in the office
hey guys how do I configure my laptop at home so that I can telnet it or make ftp when am in the office
id look at openssh-server instead of telnet + ftp its more secure and does both
sudo apt-get install openssh-server   then just make sure port22 is forwarded if you are behind a router
